attributes.action: David Cameron should resign in support of transparency concerning tax avoidance.
attributes.background: In view of the recent revelations concerning the us of 'off shore' accounts for the purposes of tax avoidance.

rejection.details:
In any case, we can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
